mapper.select: select * from member order by m_idx
mapper.insert: insert into member values(seq_member_m_idx.nextVal, #{ m_name }, #{m_nickname}, #{ m_email }, #{ m_pwd }, #{ m_zipcode }, #{ m_addr }, #{m_date}, default)
mapper.delete: delete from member where m_idx=#{ m_idx }
mapper.update: update member set m_name=#{m_name}, m_nickname=#{m_nickname}, m_email = #{m_email}, m_pwd=#{m_pwd}, m_zipcode=#{m_zipcode}, m_addr=#{m_addr}, m_grade=#{ m_grade } where m_idx=#{ m_idx }
